ComicInfo.Title: Elvira's Inferno: Canto One
ComicInfo.Summary:
Elvira’s temporal adventures land her in hot water – so hot -- one more time, and it may be the last. Her new nemesis sends her to the worst place in the universe, and we’re not talking about Encino! See it all go to Hell in the fifth exciting chapter of ELVIRA: TIMESCREAM, brought to you in Elvirascope (no special glasses required) by artist Dave Acosta (TWELVE DEVILS DANCING) and written in Elviravision by David Avallone (BETTIE PAGE), the team who brought you DOC SAVAGE: RING OF FIRE and TWILIGHT ZONE: THE SHADOW.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Joseph Michael Linsner | 1 | B | Cover B | Craig Cermak & Brittany Pezzillo | 2 | C | Cover C | Robert Hack | 3 | D/Sub | Subscription Cover | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Craig Cermak & Brittany Pezzillo | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Robert Hack | 6 | G/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Joseph Michael Linsner | 7 | H/FOC | 1:5 FOC Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Juan Castro & Salvatore Aiala | 8 | I/FOC | 1:15 FOC Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Juan Castro | 9 |
